comment.body:
@geekless and all of You ZeroNet-nerds: 'Geld ist nicht alles! But without money, about everything is dust ... Invitation: Let's make the Earth a better place, by improving ZeroNet pp. 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/

@Realjohndoe: Sorry, 'Realjohndoe'! Why do You neglect the reality? So, am I wrong, if i say:
1. 'Realjohndoe', is a digital nerd, a lawless-ghost, an artificiality? You and only You, can change this!
2. 'John Doe', is a natural-person, a strawman, bound by valid laws, an artificiality? You and only You, can change this!
3. 'DOE JOHN', is a juristical-person, a 'company', bound by valid laws, an artificiality too? You and only You, can change this!
4. That the human, that serves this three artificialities, is by law 'dead'! A fake.human! What a name, has this human? Which laws, can he claims for? NIL !! You and only You, can change this!
5. One way out - the best!? - see: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/
